reviews.review_content:
I loved this class.  The reading list that Professor D'Erasmo crafted was wonderful.  She opened my eyes to so many new authors, as well as really expanded my knowledge on craft and style.  For avid readers this class is a dream: you read a short amount of fiction every weak and then get to discuss it.  Professor D'Erasmo is really fun, too.  Our class had a great dialog and she set a very enjoyable tone.
Workload:
Weekly reading of either short stories or first chapters of novels, 5 writing exercises.
